indices.Solution: Another great way to manage apple scab is to rake under trees and prune and destroy infected leaves to reduce the number of fungal spores available to start the disease cycle over again next spring. Apply urea to trees after harvest, but before fall leaf drop as this will help speed up leaf decomposition

Prune out dead or diseased branches.
Pick all dried and shriveled fruits remaining on the trees.
Remove infected plant material from the area.
All infected plant parts should be burned, buried or sent to a municipal composting site.
Be sure to remove the stumps of any apple trees you cut down
